title: Haaland's Debut to Forget
description:
The FC crew continue to react to Saturday's FA Community Shield which saw Liverpool defeat Manchester City 3-1. Jan Aage Fjortoft, Nedum Onuoha and Mark Ogden join the show to break down Erling Haaland's nightmare debut and question why the striker is already being written off as a flop. Plus, the guys discuss Cristiano Ronaldo leaving Manchester United's friendly early and Robert Lewandowski's return to Bayern Munich.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Reaction to Erling Haaland's nightmare debut for Man City; Ronaldo leaves Man United friendly early; Lewandowski returns to Bayern
